Package nerot

Interface Summary
Store Interface for something that stores values via key/value.
Storer Something that can have a Store.
Task A Task that can be executed.
 

Class Summary
BaseTask A task that has a Store.
GenericTask A task that uses reflection to call an object generically and store the results in the Store.
MemoryStore An in-memory Store, backed by a HashMap.
Nerot Nerot lets you to easily schedule tasks on the fly (using Quartz and Spring), calling any object instance's method with any arguments you specify (class method or instance method) and can cache the result for access in a separate thread with built-in RSS retrieval and caching (using Rome).
RssUpdateTask
